testcase.name: Compose and Send Email
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Gmail login page.......................................passed When User log in with valid credentials.....................................passed And User click on the Compose button........................................passed And User wait for the compose window to appear..............................passed And User enter the recipient email address "dipakdemo66@gmail.com"..........passed And User enter the subject as "Incubyte"....................................passed And User enter the body as "Automation QA test for Incubyte"................passed And User click on the Send button...........................................passed Then the email should be sent successfully..................................passed When User navigate to the Sent folder.......................................passed And User click on "Incubyte" subject email..................................passed Then User should see a sent email with subject "Incubyte"...................passed And User should see the body "Automation QA test for Incubyte"..............passed
